verses.verse: וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard צָרֵ֥י <S%H6862><s%> Now when the adversaries יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that בְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> that the children הַגּוֹלָה֙ <S%H1473><s%> of the captivity בּוֹנִ֣ים <S%H1129><s%> builded הֵיכָ֔ל <S%H1964><s%> the temple לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּגְּשׁ֨וּ <S%H5066><s%> Then they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about זְרֻבָּבֶ֜ל <S%H2216><s%> to Zerubbabel וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> and to the chief הָֽאָב֗וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> us נִבְנֶ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> unto them Let us build עִמָּכֶ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> with כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for כָכֶ֔ם נִדְר֖וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> with you for we seek לֵֽאלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God [וְלֹא כ] (וְלֹ֣ו <S%H3808><s%> not ק) אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we זֹבְחִ֗ים <S%H2076><s%> as ye [do] and we do sacrifice מִימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> unto him since the days אֵסַ֤ר חַדֹּן֙ <S%H634><s%> of Esarhaddon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assur הַמַּעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> which brought us up hither אֹתָ֖נוּ <S%H853><s%> פֹּֽה׃ <S%H6311><s%> here

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said לָהֶ֨ם זְרֻבָּבֶ֜ל <S%H2216><s%> But Zerubbabel וְיֵשׁ֗וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> and Jeshua וּשְׁאָ֨ר <S%H7605><s%> and the rest רָאשֵׁ֤י <S%H7218><s%> of the chief הָֽאָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have nothing לָ֣כֶם וָלָ֔נוּ לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> unto them Ye have nothing to do with us to build בַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לֵאלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> unto our God כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנַ֨חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves יַ֜חַד <S%H3162><s%> but we ourselves together נִבְנֶ֗ה <S%H1129><s%> will build לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֔נוּ <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> as king כּ֥וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3566><s%> Cyrus מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king פָּרָֽס׃ <S%H6539><s%> of Persia

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> Then עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> Then the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מְרַפִּ֖ים <S%H7503><s%> weakened יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> the hands עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> of the people יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah [וּמְבַלַהִים כ] (וּֽמְבַהֲלִ֥ים <S%H1086><s%> consume ק) אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> לִבְנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1129><s%> them in building

וְסֹכְרִ֧ים <S%H7936><s%> And hired עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> against יוֹעֲצִ֖ים <S%H3289><s%> counsellors לְהָפֵ֣ר <S%H6565><s%> against them to frustrate עֲצָתָ֑ם <S%H6098><s%> their purpose כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֗י <S%H3117><s%> all the days כּ֚וֹרֶשׁ <S%H3566><s%> of Cyrus מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king פָּרַ֔ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until מַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> even until the reign דָּרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> of Darius מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king פָּרָֽס׃ <S%H6539><s%> of Persia

וּבְמַלְכוּת֙ <S%H4438><s%> And in the reign אֲחַשְׁוֵר֔וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> of Ahasuerus בִּתְחִלַּ֖ת <S%H8462><s%> in the beginning מַלְכוּת֑וֹ <S%H4438><s%> of his reign כָּתְב֣וּ <S%H3789><s%> wrote שִׂטְנָ֔ה <S%H7855><s%> they [unto him] an accusation עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> against the inhabitants יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem ס

וּבִימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> And in the days אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֗שְׂתָּא <S%H783><s%> of Artaxerxes כָּתַ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> wrote בִּשְׁלָ֜ם <S%H1312><s%> Bishlam מִתְרְדָ֤ת <S%H4990><s%> Mithredath טָֽבְאֵל֙ <S%H2870><s%> Tabeel וּשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7605><s%> and the rest [כְּנָוֹתֹו כ] (כְּנָוֹתָ֔יו <S%H3674><s%> companion ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and [אַרְתַּחְשַׁשְׂתָּא כ] (אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֖שְׂתְּ <S%H783><s%> Artaxerxes ק) מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king פָּרָ֑ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia וּכְתָב֙ <S%H3791><s%> and the writing הַֽנִּשְׁתְּוָ֔ן <S%H5406><s%> of the letter כָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> [was] written אֲרָמִ֖ית <S%H762><s%> in the Syrian tongue וּמְתֻרְגָּ֥ם <S%H8638><s%> and interpreted אֲרָמִֽית׃ <S%H762><s%> in the Syrian tongue פ

רְח֣וּם <S%H7348><s%> Rehum בְּעֵל־ <S%H1169><s%> chancellor טְעֵ֗ם <S%H2942><s%> chancellor וְשִׁמְשַׁי֙ <S%H8124><s%> and Shimshai סָֽפְרָ֔א <S%H5613><s%> the scribe כְּתַ֛בוּ <S%H3790><s%> wrote אִגְּרָ֥ה <S%H104><s%> letter חֲדָ֖ה <S%H2298><s%> a עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> against יְרוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <S%H3390><s%> Jerusalem לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֥שְׂתְּא <S%H783><s%> to Artaxerxes מַלְכָּ֖א <S%H4430><s%> the king כְּנֵֽמָא׃ <S%H3660><s%> in this sort

אֱדַ֜יִן <S%H116><s%> Then רְח֣וּם <S%H7348><s%> [wrote] Rehum בְּעֵל־ <S%H1169><s%> chancellor טְעֵ֗ם <S%H2942><s%> chancellor וְשִׁמְשַׁי֙ <S%H8124><s%> and Shimshai סָֽפְרָ֔א <S%H5613><s%> the scribe וּשְׁאָ֖ר <S%H7606><s%> and the rest כְּנָוָתְה֑וֹן <S%H3675><s%> of their companions דִּ֠ינָיֵא <S%H1784><s%> the Dinaites וַאֲפַרְסַתְכָיֵ֞א <S%H671><s%> the Apharsathchites טַרְפְּלָיֵ֣א <S%H2967><s%> the Tarpelites אֲפָֽרְסָיֵ֗א <S%H670><s%> the Apharsites [אַרְכְּוָי כ] (אַרְכְּוָיֵ֤א <S%H756><s%> Archevite ק) בָבְלָיֵא֙ <S%H896><s%> the Babylonians שֽׁוּשַׁנְכָיֵ֔א <S%H7801><s%> the Susanchites [דִּהוּא כ] (דֶּהָיֵ֖א <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch ק) עֵלְמָיֵֽא׃ <S%H5962><s%> [and] the Elamites

וּשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7606><s%> And the rest אֻמַּיָּ֗א <S%H524><s%> of the nations דִּ֤י <S%H1768><s%> whom הַגְלִי֙ <S%H1541><s%> brought over אָסְנַפַּר֙ <S%H620><s%> Asnappar רַבָּ֣א <S%H7229><s%> the great וְיַקִּירָ֔א <S%H3358><s%> and noble וְהוֹתֵ֣ב <S%H3488><s%> and settled הִמּ֔וֹ <S%H1994><s%> them בְּקִרְיָ֖ה <S%H7149><s%> in the cities דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> which שָׁמְרָ֑יִן <S%H8115><s%> of Samaria וּשְׁאָ֥ר <S%H7606><s%> and the rest עֲבַֽר־ <S%H5675><s%> [that are] on this side נַהֲרָ֖ה <S%H5103><s%> the river וּכְעֶֽנֶת׃ <S%H3706><s%> and at such a time

דְּנָה֙ <S%H1836><s%> This פַּרְשֶׁ֣גֶן <S%H6573><s%> [is] the copy אִגַּרְתָּ֔א <S%H104><s%> of the letter דִּ֚י <S%H1768><s%> that שְׁלַ֣חוּ <S%H7972><s%> they sent עֲל֔וֹהִי <S%H5922><s%> unto him עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> about אַרְתַּחְשַׁ֖שְׂתְּא <S%H783><s%> [even] unto Artaxerxes מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> the king [עַבְדָיִךְ <S%H5649><s%> Thy servants כ] (עַבְדָ֛ךְ ק) אֱנָ֥שׁ <S%H606><s%> the men עֲבַֽר־ <S%H5675><s%> on this side נַהֲרָ֖ה <S%H5103><s%> the river וּכְעֶֽנֶת׃ <S%H3706><s%> and at such a time פ

יְדִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H3046><s%> known לֶהֱוֵ֣א <S%H1934><s%> Be it לְמַלְכָּ֔א <S%H4430><s%> unto the king דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> which יְהוּדָיֵ֗א <S%H3062><s%> that the Jews דִּ֤י <S%H1768><s%> who סְלִ֙קוּ֙ <S%H5559><s%> came up מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from לְוָתָ֔ךְ <S%H3890><s%> thee עֲלֶ֥ינָא <S%H5922><s%> to us אֲת֖וֹ <S%H858><s%> are come לִירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <S%H3390><s%> unto Jerusalem קִרְיְתָ֨א <S%H7149><s%> city מָֽרָדְתָּ֤א <S%H4779><s%> the rebellious וּבִֽאישְׁתָּא֙ <S%H873><s%> and the bad בָּנַ֔יִן <S%H1124><s%> building [וְשׁוּרַיָּ כ] (וְשׁוּרַיָּ֣א <S%H7792><s%> wall ק) [אֶשְׁכְלִלוּ כ] (שַׁכְלִ֔לוּ <S%H3635><s%> complete ק) וְאֻשַּׁיָּ֖א <S%H787><s%> the foundations יַחִֽיטוּ׃ <S%H2338><s%> [thereof] and joined

כְּעַ֗ן <S%H3705><s%> now יְדִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H3046><s%> it be known לֶהֱוֵ֣א <S%H1934><s%> become לְמַלְכָּ֔א <S%H4430><s%> unto the king דִּ֠י <S%H1768><s%> that הֵ֣ן <S%H2006><s%> that if קִרְיְתָ֥א <S%H7149><s%> city דָךְ֙ <S%H1791><s%> this תִּתְבְּנֵ֔א <S%H1124><s%> be builded וְשׁוּרַיָּ֖ה <S%H7792><s%> and the walls יִֽשְׁתַּכְלְל֑וּן <S%H3635><s%> set up מִנְדָּֽה־ <S%H4061><s%> toll בְל֤וֹ <S%H1093><s%> tribute וַהֲלָךְ֙ <S%H1983><s%> and custom לָ֣א <S%H3809><s%> [again then] will they not יִנְתְּנ֔וּן <S%H5415><s%> pay וְאַפְּתֹ֥ם <S%H674><s%> the revenue מַלְכִ֖ים <S%H4430><s%> of the kings תְּהַנְזִֽק׃ <S%H5142><s%> and [so] thou shalt endamage

כְּעַ֗ן <S%H3705><s%> Now כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all קֳבֵל֙ <S%H6903><s%> according to דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> we have מְלַ֤ח <S%H4416><s%> maintenance הֵֽיכְלָא֙ <S%H1965><s%> from [the king's] palace מְלַ֔חְנָא <S%H4415><s%> the service וְעַרְוַ֣ת <S%H6173><s%> dishonour מַלְכָּ֔א <S%H4430><s%> the king's לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> and it was not אֲ‍ֽרִֽיךְ <S%H749><s%> meet לַ֖נָא לְמֶֽחֱזֵ֑א <S%H2370><s%> for us to see עַ֨ל־ <S%H5922><s%> about דְּנָ֔ה <S%H1836><s%> time שְׁלַ֖חְנָא <S%H7972><s%> have we sent וְהוֹדַ֥עְנָא <S%H3046><s%> and certified לְמַלְכָּֽא׃ <S%H4430><s%> the king
